media:group.media:title: Mindful leaders with Paolo Pirjanian #shorts
media:group.media:description:
In this episode, we explore the life of Paolo Pirjanian, PhD., the founder and CEO of Embodied, Inc., the company that created the infamous Moxie robot. Born to Armenian parents in Tehran, Paoloโs life turned upside down during the Iranian revolution, forcing him and his family to flee and eventually settle in the small town of Aalborg in Denmark. There, he faced even more distress due to discrimination, social isolation and rejection. As a result of his curiosity and grit, Paolo magically discovered the new world of robotics and machine learning, which directed him towards a successful career with NASA JPL, iRobot and Evolution Robotics. In this discussion, we touch upon the advantages and concerns connected to AI, the role of and problems with leaders and educational systems today, the purpose and mission behind Moxie the robot, and the future of Armenia after the 2020 Artsakh war and the resulting ethnic cleansing.

ิฑึีคีฅีถ ีดีซ ึีกีถีซ ึ ึ ีงี ิตึึีกีถีซ ีฉีซีพ 130 ีคีบึีธึีธึีด ีฌีกึีพีกีฎ ีดีฉีถีธีฌีธึีฟ ีงึ ิพีถีธีฒีถีฅึีจ ีฐีกีพีกึีพีธึีด ีฅีถ ีคีบึีธึีซ ีขีกีฏีธึีด, ีฝีฟีธึีกีฃึีกีฐีกีพีกึ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีธึีด ึ ีบีกีฐีกีถีปีธึีด ีฟีถึ ึีฅีถีซ ีฐึีกีชีกึีกีฏีกีถีจึ ิพีถีธีฒีถีฅึีซ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีฏีกีฝีฏีกีฎีฅีฌีซ ีง, ีฉีฅ ีซีถีนีธึ ีฅีถ ีฅึีฅึ ึีธีญีฟีถึ ึีฅีถีถีฅึีจ ีดีซีกีฝีซีถ ีธึีธีทีฅีฌ ีฌีซีกีฆีธึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีจ ีคีกีคีกึีฅึีถีฅีฌีธึ ีพีฅึีกีขีฅึีตีกีฌ ีคีซีดีธึีด ีถีฅึีฏีกีตีกึีถีฅีฌึ ิดีบึีธึีซ ีฟีถึ ึีฅีถ ีีพีกึีค ีีธีพีฝีฅึีตีกีถีจ ีทีธึึีป ีดีฅีฏ ีฟีกึีซ ีงี ีฟีถึ ึีซีถีธึีด ีง ีคีบึีธึีจึ ีีธีพีฝีฅึีตีกีถีจ ีฌึีกีฃึีธีฒีถีฅึีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด ีกีฝีกึ, ีธึ ีถีฅึึีซีถ ีญีถีคีซึีถีฅึ ีฏีกีถ, ึีธึีฑีธึีด ีฅีถ ีฏีกึีฃีกีพีธึีฅีฌึ

entry.title: Armeniaโs AOByte CEO talks industry trends and projections in the country

media:group.media:title: Armeniaโs AOByte CEO talks industry trends and projections in the country
media:group.media:description:
Tigran Sargsyan, the co-founder and CEO of the Yerevan-based software developer AOByte, sits down with CivilNetโs Mark Dovich to talk about his experience working in Armeniaโs burgeoning tech sector and where he sees the industry going in the future. Tigran also discusses the importance of the diaspora in Armeniaโs economy and provides some tips for entrepreneurs looking to get involved in the countryโs development.

ิณีตีธึีฌีฅีถีกีฏีกีถ ีคีบึีธึีถีฅึีซ ีกีผีกีปีกึีธึีดีจ ีฏีกีบีพีกีฎ ีง ิณีตีธึีฌีฅีถีกีฏีกีถ ีทีกึีชีดีกีถ ีฐีฅีฟ, ีธึีจ ีฃีฌีญีกีพีธึีธึีด ีง ีฉีธึึึ ีซีฝีฌีกีดีกีฃีฅีฟ ึ ึีกึีธีฆีซีน ีีฅีฉีธึีฌีฌีกีฐ ิณีตีธึีฌีฅีถีจึ ิฑีตีฝ ีทีกึีชีธึีดีจ, ีธึีจ ีถีกึ ีฐีกีตีฟีถีซ ีง ีธึีบีฅีฝ ีีซีฆีดีฅีฉ (ีฉีธึึึีฅึีฅีถี ยซีฎีกีผีกีตีธึีฉีตีธึีถยป), ีฝีฏีซีฆีข ีง ีกีผีฅีฌ ินีธึึึีซีกีตีธึีด 20-ึีค ีคีกึีซ ีพีฅึีปีธึีด ึ ีคึีกีถีซึ ีฐีฅีฟีธ ีฟีกึีกีฎีพีฅีฌ ีง ีกีทีญีกึีฐีธีพ ีดีฅีฏ: ิปีถีนีบีฅีีฝ ีฝีฟีกึีพีฅึ, ีธึ 1960-ีกีฏีกีถีถีฅึีซ ีฐีฅีฟีกีดีถีกึ ินีธึึึีซีกีตีธึีด ีฎีถีพีฅึ ีคีบึีธึีถีฅึีซ ีดีซ ีฐีกีดีกีฏีกึีฃ, ีธึีจ ีฃึีกีพีซีน ีคีกึีฑีกีพ ีกีทีญีกึีฐีซ ีกีดีฅีถีกีฆีกึีฃีกึีกีฎ ีฅึีฏึีถีฅึีธึีด ีกีบึีธีฒ ีดีกึีคีฏีกีถึ ีฐีกีดีกึึ

media:group.media:description:
ีิด ีฝีกีฐีดีกีถีกีบีกีฐีถีฅึีซีถ ยซิถีพีกึีฉีถีธึยป ึ ีคีกีถีกีพีกีฏีกีตีกีถีซึ ีฐีฅีผีกึีถีฅีฌีธึ ีดีกีฝีซีถ ึีถีถีกึีฏีธึีดีถีฅึีจ ีฝีฏีฝีฅีฌ ีฅีถ ีบีกีฟีฅึีกีฆีดีซึ ีญีธึีฝีกึีกีฎ ิดีดีซีฟึีซ ีีฅีฟึีกีฏีธีพีซีถ ีี-ีธึีด ีผีธึีฝีกีฏีกีถ ีธึีชีกีตีซีถีถีฅึีซ ีฏีธีฒีดีซึ ีฑีฅึีขีกีฏีกีฌีฅีฌีธึ ีฟีฅีฒีฅีฏีธึีฉีตีธึีถีซึ ีฐีฅีฟีธโค ีถีทีธึีด ีง ิฑิบ ีบีกีฟีฃีกีดีกีพีธึ, ยซีีกีฒีกึีกึีซีกีฏีกีถ ีบีกีตีดีกีถีกีฃีซึยป ีญีดีขีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีกีถีคีกีด ิฑึีดีกีถ ิตีฒีธีตีกีถีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด: ินีฅีบีฅีฟ ิตีฒีธีตีกีถีถ ีธึีฒีซีฒ ีนีซ ีบีกีฟีกีฝีญีกีถีธึีด ีฐีกึึีซีถี ีฏีกี ีกึีคีตีธึ ีผีธึีฝ ีฝีกีฐีดีกีถีกีบีกีฐีถีฅึีซีถ ิตึึีกีถีซ ึ ีคีกีถีกีพีกีฏีกีตีกีถีซึ ีฐีฅีผีกึีถีฅีฌีธึ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีธึีธีทีธึีด, ีฝีกีฏีกีตีถ ีถีทีธึีด ีง, ีธึ ีคีก ีบีฅีฟึ ีนีง ีจีถีคีธึีถีฅีฌ, ีธึีบีฅีฝ ีผีธึีฝีกีฏีกีถ ีผีกีฆีดีกีฏีกีถ ีถีฅึีฏีกีตีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฏึีณีกีฟีธึีด ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด:

media:group.media:title: ิตึึีกีถีซ ีถีพีกีฆีธีฒ ีฏีกีถีกีนีถ ีธึ ีฉีฒีฉีซ ีพึีก ีดีถีกึีกีฎ ีฎีกีผีฅึีจ
media:group.media:description:
ิตึึีกีถีจ ีพีกีฒีธึึ ีฏีธึึึีฅีฌ ีง ีกีตีถ ีฏีกีถีกีน ึีธีถีคีจ, ีธึ ีธึีถีฅึ ีดีซ ึีกีถีซ ีฟีกีฝีถีตีกีฏ ีฟีกึีซ ีกีผีกีปึ ีีฅึีฏีกีตีธึีด ึีกีฒีกึีธึีด ีจีถีคีฐีกีถีธึึ ึ ีฃีฟีกีฃีธึีฎีดีกีถ ีฏีกีถีกีน ีฟีกึีกีฎึีถีฅึีซึ ีดีถีกึีฅีฌ ีง 850 ีฐีก ีฏีกีด ิตึึีกีถีซ ีจีถีคีฐีกีถีธึึ ีดีกีฏีฅึีฅีฝีซ 3,6%-ีจึ ิฑีผีธีฒีปีกีบีกีฐีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกีทีญีกึีฐีกีตีซีถ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีนีกึีธึีธีทีซีนีถีฅึีธีพี ีดีฅีฏ ีทีถีนีซีถ ีกีถีฐึีกีชีฅีทีฟ ีง ีกีผีถีพีกีฆีถ 9 ึีด ีฏีกีถีกีน ีฟีกึีกีฎึึ 1990-ีซีถ ิตึึีกีถีธึีด ีดีฅีฏ ีทีถีนีซีถ ีขีกีชีซีถ ีง ีฐีกีฝีฅีฌ ีทีธึึีป 8,5 ึีด ีฏีกีถีกีน ีฟีกึีกีฎึึ ีีฅึีฏีกีตีธึีด ิตึึีกีถีธึีด ีดีฅีฏ ีทีถีนีซีถ ีขีกีชีซีถ ีง ีจีถีฏีถีธึีด, ีฌีกีพีกีฃีธึีตีถ ีคีฅีบึีธึีด, 7,5 ึีด ีฏีกีถีกีน ีฟีกึีกีฎึ, ีซีฝีฏ ิฟีฅีถีฟึีธีถ ีพีกึีนีกีฏีกีถ ีทึีปีกีถีซ ีขีถีกีฏีซีนีถีฅึีซีถี ีจีถีคีกีดีฅีถีจ 3 ึีดึ

entry.title: โMy goal is to use AI to help make the world a better placeโ, Paolo Pirjanian, Ph.D

media:group.media:title: โMy goal is to use AI to help make the world a better placeโ, Paolo Pirjanian, Ph.D
media:group.media:description:
00:00 Paolo Pirjanianโs mission in life 1:25 Life challenges growing up 4:16 Finding your passion and the role of education systems 8:01 What skills do we need in an AI-expanded future? 11:37 Concerns with humans misusing or abusing AI 17:49 What qualities and wisdom should leaders have today? 19:43 How to build human connection in a world of virtual reality 22:28 Life transformation and the birth of Moxie the Robot 28:47 The relevance of Moxie and future plans for this robot 35:15 The future of Armenia
In this episode, we explore the life of Paolo Pirjanian, PhD., the founder and CEO of Embodied, Inc., the company that created the infamous Moxie robot. Born to Armenian parents in Tehran, Paoloโs life turned upside down during the Iranian revolution, forcing him and his family to flee and eventually settle in the small town of Aalborg in Denmark. There, he faced even more distress due to discrimination, social isolation and rejection. As a result of his curiosity and grit, Paolo magically discovered the new world of robotics and machine learning, which directed him towards a successful career with NASA JPL, iRobot and Evolution Robotics. In this discussion, we touch upon the advantages and concerns connected to AI, the role of and problems with leaders and educational systems today, the purpose and mission behind Moxie the robot, and the future of Armenia after the 2020 Artsakh war and the resulting ethnic cleansing.
About Paolo Pirjanian, Ph.D
Paolo Pirjanian is the founder and CEO of Embodied, Inc., a company established in 2016 with the vision of building socially and emotionally intelligent companies that improve care and wellness and enhance our daily lives. Pirjanian is the former CTO of iRobot and an early leader in consumer robotics with 16+ years of experience developing and commercializing cutting-edge home robots. He worked at NASA JPL and led world-class teams and companies at iRobotยฎ, Evolution Roboticsยฎ, and others.
Program Overview Mindful Leaders dives into the stories of people who have achieved prominence, walked incredible journeys, and have defined culture.
Lara sits down with specialists, thinkers, and change catalysts to deconstruct insights, events, and lessons that have shaped their personal and professional lives and have enabled them to create meaning and connection.
